titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. Die Martis, 30. Martii 1647. That the two Houses of Parliament having received information of a dangerous petition, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: Order to print signed: Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Expressing their disapproval of "a petition tending to put the army into a distemper and mutiny."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old Baily
